body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, this is James Foster from Sun Motors, how may I assist you today? May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jennifer. Can you please provide me with your phone number so we can reach out to you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is nine eight seven six five four three two one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And could you also share your email address with us?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my email address is jennifer.watson@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect. We will make sure to follow up with you on your inquiry. Is there anything else you'd like to add or ask about today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, everything seems fine. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jennifer, for your time. Have a great day!
